<The Berlin Marathon

Text: Berlin Marathon:  The official marathon distance of 42.195 kilometers (26 miles 385 yards) is set up as a citywide road race where professional athletes and amateur runners jointly participate.

Text: Berlin Marathon:  Initiated in 1974, the event traditionally takes place on the last weekend in September.
